bibl.title: Restoration Methods of the Papyri Preserved in the Egyptian Museum of Cairo.
Studi di Egittologia e di Antichità puniche

bibl.note: First part (in March 1997) of a restoration project of Greek papyri in the Egyptian Museum of Cairo, with the co-operation of the Egyptian Museum, the University of Lecce and the University of Bologna.
CAPASSO Mario, Restoration Methods of the Papyri Preserved in the Egyptian Museum of Cairo.
Studi di Egittologia e di Antichità puniche 17 (1998) pp. 39-43.
